title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks Panthers beat writer Joe Person about what Baker told the press during his first public appearance as a Panther. ESPN's Brian Windhorst shares which team he thinks has the best shot Donovan Mitchell. And David Feherty outlines what's allowed Tiger to be so successful at The Open in the past.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
